org.apache.ambari.server.stack.upgrade.orchestrate

Class StageWrapperBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.stack.upgrade.orchestrate.StageWrapperBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusterGrouping.ClusterBuilder, ParallelClientGroupingBuilder, ServiceCheckGrouping.ServiceCheckBuilder

    public abstract class StageWrapperBuilder
extends Object
    Defines how to build stages for an Upgrade or Downgrade.

    • Field Summary

      protected Grouping m_grouping
      The upgrade/downgrade grouping that the builder is for.

      • add

        public abstract void add(UpgradeContext upgradeContext,
                         HostsType hostsType,
                         String service,
                         boolean clientOnly,
                         UpgradePack.ProcessingComponent pc,
                         Map<String,String> params)
        Adds a processing component that will be built into stage wrappers.
        Parameters:
        upgradeContext - the upgrade context
        hostsType - the hosts, along with their type
        service - the service name
        clientOnly - whether the service is client only, no service checks
        pc - the ProcessingComponent derived from the upgrade pack
        params - additional parameters

      • build

        public final List<StageWrapper> build(UpgradeContext upgradeContext)
        Builds the stage wrappers, including any pre- and post-procesing that needs to be performed.
        Parameters:
        upgradeContext - the upgrade context (not null).
        Returns:
        a list of stages, never null

      • beforeBuild

        protected List<StageWrapper> beforeBuild(UpgradeContext upgradeContext)
        Performs any pre-processing that needs to be performed on the list of stage wrappers.
        Parameters:
        upgradeContext - the upgrade context (not null).
        Returns:
        the initial list of stage wrappers, or an empty list (never null).

      • build

                                         List<StageWrapper> stageWrappers)
        Builds the stage wrappers.
        Parameters:
        upgradeContext - the upgrade context (not null).
        stageWrappers - the list of stage wrappers created by beforeBuild(UpgradeContext).
        Returns:
        the stage wrapper list, (never null)

      • afterBuild

        protected List<StageWrapper> afterBuild(UpgradeContext upgradeContext,
                                        List<StageWrapper> stageWrappers)
        Performs any post-processing that needs to be performed on the list of stage wrappers.
        Parameters:
        upgradeContext - the upgrade context (not null).
        stageWrappers - the list of stage wrappers created by build(UpgradeContext, List).
        Returns:
        the post-processed list of stage wrappers (never null)

      • resolveTasks

        protected List<Task> resolveTasks(UpgradeContext context,
                                  boolean preTasks,
                                  UpgradePack.ProcessingComponent pc)
        Determine the list of pre- or post-tasks given these rules
        • When performing an upgrade, only use upgrade tasks
        • When performing a downgrade, use the downgrade tasks if they are defined
        • When performing a downgrade, but no downgrade tasks exist, reuse the upgrade tasks
        Parameters:
        context - the upgrade context
        preTasks - true if loading pre-(upgrade|downgrade) or {@code false for post-(upgrade|downgrade)
        pc - the processing component holding task definitions
        Returns:
        A collection, potentially empty, of the tasks to run, which may contain either pre or post tasks if they exist, and the order depends on whether it's an upgrade or downgrade.

      • resolveTask

        protected Task resolveTask(UpgradeContext context,
                           UpgradePack.ProcessingComponent pc)
        The upgrade packs are written such that there is one and only one upgrade element for a component, all other directives go in (pre|post)-(upgrade|downgrade) elements.
        Parameters:
        pc - the processing component
        Returns:
        the single task, or null if there is none

      • getParallelHostCount

        protected int getParallelHostCount(UpgradeContext ctx,
                                   int defaultValue)
        Gets the parallel setting for a grouping, if defined.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the upgrade context
        defaultValue - if the parallel scheduler is not found, return this value instead
        Returns:
        the count of hosts to run in parallel
